description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below.
full_summary:
# Tender Notice

### Tender Details

* **Reference Number** : PW-22-01017398
* **Amendment Number** : 0
* **Solicitation Number** : W8485-237480/A
* **Publication Date** : December 15, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date** : January 17, 2023 14:00 (EST)
* **Tender Status** : EXPIRED

### Goods and Services

* **General Service Identifier (GSIN)** : 6680 ( Liquid and Gas Flow, Liquid Level and Mechanical Motion Measuring Instruments )
* **Contracting Entity Name** : Department of National Defence
* **End User Entities Name** : Department of National Defence

### Procurement Details

* **Procurement Category** : Goods
* **Procurement Method** : Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements** : Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Region of Opportunity** : World
* **Region of Delivery** : Canada
* **Contract Start Date** :
* **Contract End Date** :

### Bidding Instructions

* **Bid Solicitation Documents** : Available on [eBuy] (https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/15/5296bb20cd1f853ff5a3af9fedcba6cb/w8485-237480a_bid_solictation_en.pdf) (English) and (https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/15/a47edacf12bae409f8ad270176e47eb4/w8485-237480a_bid_solictation_fr.pdf) (French)
* **Submission Method** : Electronic submission ( [epost Connect] )
* **Contact Information** :
	+ **Name** : Lebel, Danny
	+ **Email Address** : [dany.lebel2@forces.gc.ca](mailto:dany.lebel2@forces.gc.ca)

Due to the COVID-19 pandemic, we strongly recommend sending bids electronically through [ePost Connect](https://buyandsell.gc.ca/public/app/epia). Delivery is requested by March 20th, 2023.
